nodes.text: The Yag'Dhul theater was one of the six theaters of operations of the Outer Rim Sieges, which took place during the final stages of the Clone Wars.

The Yag'Dhul theater was located in the Expansion Region and the Mid Rim, along the Corellian Trade Spine. This field of operations was named after the key Separatist world of Yag'Dhul, which was located in the Inner Rim.

The Yag'Dhul theater was abruptly abandoned by the Separatists to supply warships for General Grievous's daring strike at Coruscant. Using secret hyperlanes that cut through the Deep Core, the Separatist fleet slipped past Coruscant's defense net and entered orbit around the capital. A week-long battle ensued, culminating with General Grievous kidnapping Supreme Chancellor Palpatine.
